SageTVPlugin.Name: Phoenix API
SageTVPlugin.Description: Phoenix API Extensions for SageTV. The Phoenix APIs include support Fanart, Dynamic Menus, Custom Views, etc. The API is the foundation for the Phoenix project.
SageTVPlugin.Author: stuckless,meinmaui,bialio
